#For developers

Ingredients:
  * FDT (4.5 at time of writing)
  * Flex SDK (flex_sdk_4.5.1.21328 at time of writing)
  * [http://subversion.tigris.org/ SVN] checkout the [http://code.google.com/p/cccatcher/source/checkout Source]

Preparation: 
  * in FDT -> File -> Import -> type Flex -> Select Fx Project -> Next
  * Select root directory -> browse -> cccatcher checkout location -> open
  * Project type: AS3 AIR 4.5
  * Finish

Debug:
  * Run -> Run Configurations -> CCCatcher -> Start -> Use Air Descriptor File -> bin/CCCatcherPure-app.xml -> Run

Release:
  * ???

If you don't see any fonts:
  * open your /flex-sdk-###/frameworks/air-config.xml file and comment out all <fonts><managers> besides flash.fonts.AFEFontManager (it's the only one that works).
